A data transfer object (DTO) that defines filtering criteria for tool-related REST API operations. This class uses Lombok annotations for automatic generation of getters, setters, and constructors, along with Swagger annotations for API documentation.

## Key Components

- **enabled** - Boolean filter for tool enabled/disabled status
- **type** - String filter for specific tool types
- **category** - String filter for tool categories
- **platformCategory** - String filter for platform-specific categories
- **@Schema** annotations - Provide OpenAPI/Swagger documentation
- **Lombok annotations** - Auto-generate boilerplate code (getters, setters, builder pattern)

## Usage Example

```java
// Using builder pattern
ToolFilterCriteria criteria = ToolFilterCriteria.builder()
    .enabled(true)
    .type("database")
    .category("monitoring")
    .platformCategory("cloud")
    .build();

// Using constructor
ToolFilterCriteria criteria = new ToolFilterCriteria(true, "api", "integration", "on-premise");

// Setting individual properties
ToolFilterCriteria criteria = new ToolFilterCriteria();
criteria.setEnabled(false);
criteria.setType("security");
```

This DTO is typically used as a request parameter in REST controllers to filter tool collections based on multiple criteria simultaneously.
